Sentencas: One of the key requirements for the application of planar solid oxide fuel cells is the hermetical sealing of ceramic and metallic stack-components.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: Gas tightness and associated mechanical integrity of the sealants are therefore key prerequisites for reliable operation over the lifetime of the stack.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: To withstand mechanical stresses generated by the differences in thermal expansion of the involved materials as well as non-equilibrium thermal conditions upon heating and cooling, joining with metals rather than brittle glass-ceramics is considered to be advantageous.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: Hence, as one of the joining possibilities for SOFCs of planar design reactive air brazing of the ceramic cell into a metallic frame has gained increasing interest and proofed its suitability in several mid term full scale stack experiments at Forschungszentrum Julich.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: Fracture experiments were carried out to characterize the fracture energy and associated failure mechanisms of silver-based reactive air brazes, used for joining the zirconia electrolyte of an anode supported planar cell with a metallic Crofer22APU frame.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: The specimens were mechanically tested in notched beam bending geometry at room temperature.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: Mechanical testing was accompanied by in-situ observation with optical and SEM resolution.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: Discussion of the results focuses on the influence of isothermal aging and associated interfacial reactions on crack path location and mechanical characteristics.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: State of the art CuO-containing brazes turned out to be outbalanced by a newly conceived CuO-free braze.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks

Sentencas: The new braze did not only display superior delamination resistance in the as-brazed state, combined with an additional pre-oxidation treatment of the steel but also showed improved degradation resistance against isothermal aging.
Titulo: Effect of isothermal aging on the mechanical performance of brazed ceramic/metal joints for planar SOFC-stacks
